from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
### mount the data lake storage in Synapse to the Synapse File Mount API
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/ims_items") 
mssparkutils.fs.mount( 
"abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/IMS/API-Data/",
"/ims_items", 
{"linkedService":"ls_storage"}

from datetime import date
# dd/mm/YY

today = date.today()
todaysdate = today.strftime("%Y%m%d")
print(todaysdate)

import json
import pandas as pd
import csv
def conversion_ims(source):
    attributesList=[]
    with open(f"/synfs/{jobId}/ims_items/{source}.json", "r",encoding='utf-8') as inputfile:
        ims_dict = json.load(inputfile)
        for items in ims_dict["data"]:
            dict = items['attributes']
            attributesList.append(dict)
    sparkDF = spark.createDataFrame(attributesList)
    sparkDF.repartition(1).write.option("header",True).csv(f"abfss://odw-raw@{storage_acc_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/IMS/API-Data/{source}.csv"+todaysdate)

conversion_ims("IMS_bdc_attribute")
conversion_ims("IMS_bdc_entity")
conversion_ims("IMS_data_flow")
conversion_ims("IMS_data_sharing")
conversion_ims("IMS_dpia")
conversion_ims("IMS_information_assets")
conversion_ims("IMS_integration")
conversion_ims("IMS_master_data_map")
conversion_ims("IMS_ropa")
